title: Uncle Smiley goes camping
creator_credit: Jim Burroughs, Joe Sutherin, GME Films and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Shows children how to protect their environment by keeping it clean and safe. Uncle Smiley takes the children on a camping trip where they see that there are rules campers should follow to ensure the safety of themselves and others. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Jim Burroughs, Joe Sutherin, GME Films and Learning Corporation of America
description: Shows children how to protect their environment by keeping it clean and safe. Uncle Smiley takes the children on a camping trip where they see that there are rules campers should follow to ensure the safety of themselves and others. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
description_for_label: Shows children how to protect their environment by keeping it clean and safe.
